website_summaries.verdict: This saucer chair offers extra comfort while camping or enjoying the outdoors.
pros: Extra padded edges support the arms and upper body
Fabric is water and weather resistant while it wicks moisture away
Features a large rear pocket for items
cons: Padding support under the legs leaves a lot to be desired for extra comfort

customer_reviews.title: German Shepherd approved...
customer_reviews.text: My 65 pound crazy looking brindle German Shepherd thinks he's a carpenter and likes to spend time in the woodworking shop with his old man (pro shop with full dust collection, so no hate mail about the dog breathing sawdust:-)). Anyway he loves his new chair, which means I love his chair. Seems like top quality...
customer_reviews.author: joshua whaley

customer_reviews.title: ... always had the normal camping chairs and nothing felt like it "fit
customer_reviews.text: I've always had the normal camping chairs and nothing felt like it "fit." I was scared for this, but I'm in love. I now wish I got the one with the cooler in the back! It was smaller than I anticipated and I was worried since I'm 5'8" and 260lbs. This thing didn't flinch and I felt "surrounded" and comfortable. I didn't have arm rests to finagle and it opens and closes so easily. The bag holds the chair easily and doesn't feel like you can never get it to fit correctly. If I needed a reason to buy more I would! A very satisfying and happy purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: This is the most comfortable portable lawn chair ever! It's probably a bit heavier than the typical camp chair but not a problem to carry at all. The best feature is the ease of opening and closing. I also like the way it stands when collapsed. I use it twice every day to take my little pup out to run around in the yard. It's very sturdy and could certainly handle a much larger person than my 160 pounds.
customer_reviews.author: Kokimoe

customer_reviews.title: Quality was OK but for the price, I was ...
customer_reviews.text: Quality was OK but for the price, I was expecting a much larger, more luxurious chair. Ended up returning these and getting larger plusher versions of the same design from Bed Bath and Beyond for the same price.
customer_reviews.author: C. Girard

customer_reviews.title: Not What I Ordered
customer_reviews.text: I can't rate this chair high for two reasons. The first being that it is not what I ordered. I did order the Blue Moon Chair, but it did not have the cup holder as requested. The second and most important factor was that it did not fold easily as described in the write-up. I had to struggle with it to make it fold. I returned the item (Thank You, Amazon) and purchased another since I thought it might just be this chair. It was! The 2nd chair arrived in 2 days and it was exactly what I ordered and it folded very easily. I bought a 2nd chair for my wife and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Coreman

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and comfortable chairs
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought two of these chairs for my two cattle dogs. They like to sit at the campfire with us when we take the snowmobiles out in our toy hauler, but they won't sit on the cold ground for long. The saucer type chair makes a perfect raised dog bed that they won't fall out the sides. They are happy campers now. I work hard so my dogs can have a better life!
customer_reviews.author: Jill Gaughan

customer_reviews.title: Great chair...  maybe not lightweight, but very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: This is an incredible chair. It is very comfortable and very good sized. I gave it 4 stars, not due to quality or any problems, but because the title is lightweight. It's fairly light, but not nearly as light as many camping chairs. It's also fairly large when folded. It does fold up pretty tight, but it's just a big chair. I don't think I'd call it lightweight. All that said, I love it. It's so relaxing to sit in and goes with me almost everywhere I go!
customer_reviews.author: BI707Top Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Well built but not comfortable for taller people
customer_reviews.text: This chair is very solidly built and very easy to set up. The chair is very spacious by its design but it does have a couple of design issues. I like lounging back on camp but the back isn’t high enough for my head!! Sleeping for me 5’11” is not at all comfortable! Also because it is a circular chair a bar runs around the front, if I stretch my legs out this bar presses against my legs (not comfortable) For smaller people this chair may work very well given its excellent build quality.
customer_reviews.author: D. Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Nice seat, short legs *see update*
customer_reviews.text: Love the chair. The only reason for the 4 stars instead of 5, is that the legs are super short - so you sit pretty low to the ground (and I don't have super long legs). I should have looked at the specs more carefully. Besides that, it's a great seat! PS We are using ours on the patio, so no news about the fold and carry... Update: already blew a screw. Way too much money for the lack of quality, and the squatness of the seat. Wish now I'd sent it back. Lowering my stars to 2
customer_reviews.author: Aussiemama67

customer_reviews.title: BEST CHAIRS EVER
customer_reviews.text: My hubs and I are a bit of the 'fluffy' side and we LOVE these chairs! Took them camping last weekend, and everyone couldn't stop stealing our spots! We never once sat down and thought we were going to go heel up - they held even the less sober 'plops' down with ease (hey - we were camping). Highly recommend to those looking for some sturdy cushion for their wide loads (or otherwise). :)
customer_reviews.author: Tori

customer_reviews.title: Everyone steals it.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't believe the reviews, but it's true. Everyone steals it. I bought this for myself for an extended family camping trip and I got to sit in it once the whole weekend. It's worth not having the cup holder just because the design is so stinking comfy. I've kept it on the back porch for the last 6 months to sit in all the time. Which is a bad idea, fyi, due to the humidity in FL it now is developing tiny mildew spots on it. But I don't blame the company for that, I'm surprised it lasted as long as it did out there without any damage. The only downside is the price.
customer_reviews.author: bbeau

customer_reviews.title: Depends on what you like.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this chair. It feels very cozy and keeps me warm. It’s not good for head support but that doesn’t bother me. It was a little difficult to fold the first few times but now it’s better. I have two of these and they are my favorite camping chairs I have ever had. I am 160lbs and fit comfortably but it is kind of low so for someone taller it might be a little difficult to get out of and be sure to check the weight limit before buying.
customer_reviews.author: Kindra M.

customer_reviews.title: Love this product...
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to replace a pair of "gravity chairs". This was a great replacement. I use these chairs primarily for RV camping. I needed something that was compact, light, and comfortable. Specifically, would these chairs be a good replacement for my gravity chairs. In comparison, they're far more compact, much lighter, and just as comfortable than our gravity chairs. The quality build is good, but I'm still hesitant about these tubular designs. Time will tell. That being said, after a few outings, these are standing up to the rigors of week-long camping. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: ArnellTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Nice design and shape.
customer_reviews.text: This little chair is perfect for tailgates, the beach, park, anywhere. My only complaint is that I’m a little on the taller side so there is less space for me to sit on, but other than that it is perfect. Folds up quickly and compactly, and is easy to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Alphanumeric

customer_reviews.title: Clearly made for children, not adults.
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is well made and heavy. Five stars. The fact that it's made for a child or an adult under 5 feet tall, but advertised as an adult chair, one star.
customer_reviews.author: Jenifer J. Schall

customer_reviews.title: The coolest Chair ever!!
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these chairs and my mother fell in love with them so we ordered her one for her birthday! It is a wonderful blue that folds easily and fits in its case well. It is very comfortable and has a cool little pocket on the side, it even has a pocket on the back to hold the case or whatever you want to put in it. I recommend this to anyone who want to be King of the camp and the most comfortable!! I will so buy another one in the future!!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this chair a year ago and used it a handful of times camping. This past trip the plastic joints cracked amd broke. Not sturdy enough for an average adult female (I weigh aboit 170lbs). My son has a similar chair made by Ozarks that we bought at Walmart for half the price and it has lasted 3 times as long. This chair was comfortable until it broke, but definitely not worth the price paid with such poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: M. Eby

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable seam in middle pulls
customer_reviews.text: The engineering of this seat seems off. The material is too tight in the middle, which makes it pull when you sit down to go right between your butt cheeks. It all looks normal until you sit down. I am not sure if just THIS one is defective. I have contacted Seller. :) Very expensive for unintelligent engineering. Smaller and heavier than I would have liked.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Husband Approved
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a new gaming chair for my husband. He kept accidentally breaking the arms off of cheap camping chairs.. He loves it! It folds up nice, with a handle in the back for easier storage/carrying.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Carr

customer_reviews.title: Very petite, not comf
customer_reviews.text: This chair is small. For a child or small teenager should be fine. Since this is our 2nd camping trip since getting our new to us camper I ordered these chairs after our 1st trip and the return window is closed. These chairs are just not comfortable, the base is too narrow, the seat is sturdy but doesn’t give for comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Ncgirl

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable. The chair was so comfy neither my brother or my dad wanted to give it up. 4 stars is only cause i wish it had cup holders or a table or something.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy Theriault

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I am a special education teacher I needed a affordable chair that seemed like a saucer seat for students that need to cuddle up and feel secure. This chair provides my students with exactly what they need I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not adult size
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'4" and this was way too small for me. I have it to my 7 year old granddaughter. It was perfect for her
customer_reviews.author: Annie Bee

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I only had this chair since March and it broke, not worth the moneyNot worth the money, For $49 you would think something would last more than three months
customer_reviews.author: jamiemchg

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome camping chairs.
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome camping chairs. This was the only brand/supplier that I could find with the nice Red and Black color scheme. They are heavier than I was expecting but seem well built compared to today's standards. We are full size adults and do stick up above the back of the chair but don't find that an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Jess H.

customer_reviews.title: decent padding for legs.
customer_reviews.text: purchased for high school athletes outdoor seating for races. Good height, comfortable padding, and easy to fold and carry in bag. only a few dollars more than the common cheaper camp chairs and more comfortable. satisfied with purchase. i would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: susan ct

customer_reviews.title: But its nice just super small
customer_reviews.text: Thought I was buying one comparable to one I already have yeah not!!! See photo of comparison..... Return. But its nice just super small.
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The bar hits right under your thigh, not enough padding so very uncomfortable. If you sat with legs crossed in your lap it’d be okay but who can sit that way for long? It looks like it’s cushy but very little padding.
customer_reviews.author: Scoop

customer_reviews.title: I love this chair!!
customer_reviews.text: I have arthritis and the conventional camp chairs are difficult for me to get out of. This chair is awesome! Not only is it much easier for me to get out of, I don't feel like I'm sitting in a hole. The chair is very sturdy, very comfortable and very convenient. It is well worth the money! I would recommend it for anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Nyla  Petersen

customer_reviews.title: Small,small,small!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the worst chair ever! Tiny, little, and a pain in the you know what to fold. Trust me, SAVE YOUR MONEY!!!
customer_reviews.author: kevin metzgus

customer_reviews.title: ONLY BUY FOR CHILDREN 5 FT OR SHORTER
customer_reviews.text: VERY SMALL COMPARED TO OTHER PADDED CHAIRS. NOT PARTICULARLY PADDED. I am very surprised that this chair received such good reviews. The picture and videos on the product listing don't really show how small the chair is. The men in the photo must be extra scrunched down to make it look like it is an appropriate size for adults. The video reviews do not show someone actually sit down in the chair. I am only 5 ft. 9 in. tall and the chair comes to the lower part of my shoulder blades. The padding is not very thick.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The bottom pins break or pop out
customer_reviews.text: Sadly after just a little use one of the two chairs we purchased broke at the feet with the pin popping out of the pole hole at the foot. You would expect them to hold up but no look. These were not abused just sat in while camping on intended use.
customer_reviews.author: PB Johns

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good chair.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality material. Comfy. It's what you expect from a 50$ chair. I like the design. I'll probably sick with the circle designs from here on out. It would be better if it was higher for neck support.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Great buy. Slow shipping
customer_reviews.text: The pictures made our look like it was padded like a seat cushion but it's not. Other than that no complaints. It's more than plenty big enough sturdy and comfy. Worth the purchase just wish it was on prime. Shipping took a while but maybe ive just been spoiled with prime
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Pierson

customer_reviews.title: Super confortable camping chair!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my overland setup! Obviously, this chair is bulky and not for carrying around doing a hike. Everyone that sit in this chair loved it and more than once i had to claim it back lol Definitly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Pierre Belanger

customer_reviews.title: Great chair, horrible cup holder!
customer_reviews.text: This chair is super comfy to sit in! The only downfall is the cup holder (or lack of)! There is a pocket on the side of the chair which I tried to put a can of soda, but it immediately spilled. I’m not sure if the pocket was intended to be a cup holder or not, but if it was, it’s awful! The chair is great other than that!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Nice chair
customer_reviews.text: Very nice chair, spent 6 hours on it at an outdoor blues festival and never got fatigued or uncomfortable. Easy to setup, a little harder to close mainly due to unfamiliarity.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The chair is easy to open and refold for storage. It has a large storage bag. The height of the chair is perfect and the drink holder is great.
customer_reviews.author: Katee Culp

customer_reviews.title: Defective stitching.
customer_reviews.text: I’m sure it would be great, but the stitching was defective. A photo is attached. This was straight out of the box. Sadly, I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for our 11-year old granddaughter who wanted a "special" chair for camping. She loves it and it works perfectly for her. She's tall for her age and is able to curl her legs under her in this chair.
customer_reviews.author: shark

customer_reviews.title: SECOND ONE
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable bag chair. This was my second one. Easy to transport for camping. Easy to set up and take down and rebag.
customer_reviews.author: BIG WALT MACHINE

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The chair is easy to open and refold for storage. It has a large storage bag. The height of the chair is perfect and the drink holder is great.
customer_reviews.author: Katee Culp

customer_reviews.title: YES-a quality seat
customer_reviews.text: This chair is a great all around choice for all things outdoors. It is sturdy. Made of adequate materials especially the seating surface itself is above standard. The chair it replaced cost the same(lasted a long time) but in comparisons was made of substandard material. My neighbors like it and are already were looking to get their own.
customer_reviews.author: Dirty paws

customer_reviews.title: So comfy you won't want to get back up!
customer_reviews.text: Super comfy and sturdy, and the legs make it very stable on gravelly campsites. These are a little wider than most other brands, making them pretty roomy for getting cozy with some blankets and hot cocoa. My dog especially enjoyed curling up in one next to the campfire. These seem built to last, unlike the cheap camp chairs that are sold at most box stores.
customer_reviews.author: M. White

customer_reviews.title: Great chair!
customer_reviews.text: Collapses very easily and very compact. I use it at the Drive-In movie!
customer_reviews.author: k.e.fraser.md@prodigy.net

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: The chair is a lot smaller than I thought it would be. It is not that comfortable for sitting in it for any length of time. We are full time rv’ers and sit outside a lot. Would not recommend this chair.
customer_reviews.author: carrie g.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my daughter; she uses the chair at her desk so she can sit comfortably while doing her studies. She loves the chair.
customer_reviews.author: CRMB

customer_reviews.title: It's comfortable but I had higher expectations for lounging in it
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'5 and the chair sit very well for me. Might be a little short for my husband. It's comfortable but I had higher expectations for lounging in it. It's more of just a chair. My kids (5 and 2) can curl up and nap in it.
customer_reviews.author: Karie R

customer_reviews.title: Not a full size
customer_reviews.text: Not as big as I wanted, hoped to sit cross legged on it and can't comfortably
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Glimme

customer_reviews.title: WOULD BUY AGAIN
customer_reviews.text: Used the chair for he first time for the eclipse; very comfortable. Takes up more space than a normal bag chair, but does not cut into back of legs and has some padding.
customer_reviews.author: BIG WALT MACHINE

customer_reviews.title: Comfy Chair
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable chair, bought it to take to dog shows. easy to carry around, has its own bag. Nice material, lots of complements on it.
customer_reviews.author: run2it

customer_reviews.title: SATISFIED!!! Great Chair, Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: VERY comfortable, sturdy chair! Gives great back support, which I really need since I have bulging discs in my lower back, along with degenerative facet disease in my spine. SATISFIED!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tricia Ladner

customer_reviews.title: So comfy!
customer_reviews.text: THE MOST COMFY CHAIR EVER! We bought two for our camper and everyone fights over them. Buying two more next summer so all of us can use them.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzo82

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money. Sturdy 2 years later
customer_reviews.text: Have owned these 2 years now. Bought 4. We love them. Have taken them camping, to parades, hanging in the driveway. I bought them for my children bc nice to curl up in and hard to tip over. I’m 5’2” and my husband is 6’1” and both of us sit in them too. Still sturdy with no wear.
customer_reviews.author: DRTown

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Chair isn't comfortable; I sat in other chairs similar to this one & they were more comfortable than this particular chair.
customer_reviews.author: P J

customer_reviews.title: This chair is great! It is the best folding chair I have
customer_reviews.text: This chair is great! It is the best folding chair I have, very strong and comfortable, it is suitable for camping, good quality, strong cushioning support, huge space, easy to fold.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable camping chair. I took it to a campsite for an overnight stay and it held up to mud, rain, rocks, and a 70 lb lab. I'll probably buy another one soon. Only thing that was troublesome was the bag it came with. I can never seem to get items back into the travel bags they come in.
customer_reviews.author: nosh88

customer_reviews.title: The back isn't high enough
customer_reviews.text: Back isn't high enough, but it'll do until I replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Cox

customer_reviews.title: Great chair for the vertically challenged
customer_reviews.text: Great chair for the vertically challenged, I am 6' and it is low for me but perfect for my 5'3" spouse.
customer_reviews.author: Prolitejay

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Wife loves the comfort and size of the chair.
customer_reviews.author: pis5krzach

customer_reviews.title: Great camping chair
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite camping chair of all time. It’s really comfy to curl up in and folds small and light.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer 007

customer_reviews.title: A most comfy camp chair
customer_reviews.text: Just as durable as any other 'camp' chair -- but way more fun and comfortable for the kids. I wouldn't suggest it for anyone over 200 lbs. though (including myself in that, ha ha). Pretty lightweight leg supports.
customer_reviews.author: TripsPlusOneTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than I thought but comfy
customer_reviews.text: Just purchased 2 Coleman chairs for the price of one of these. Smaller than I thought but comfy. Wouldn’t buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Thisdudeabides

customer_reviews.title: Great, sturdy chair that lasts!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this chair in 2016 for my daughter. We camp quite a bit and she always uses this chair. Three summers later this chair is still in perfect condition. It is very comfortable and extremely sturdy. The canvas is thick and has great padding. I’d buy this chair again for sure except I don’t need to because it’s still perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Terrah J. Rash

customer_reviews.title: ... was concerned about finding a chair that would be comfortable for him
customer_reviews.text: My son is 6'7" so I was concerned about finding a chair that would be comfortable for him. He loves this so much he is using in his room to game from. Excellent quality and fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Kimmy

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: I like the chair overall. Had to make a slight repair out of the box but got it to work. It also sits lower to the ground than expected. I’m 5’2” and it’s low for me.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Hymes

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable chair and plenty of room
customer_reviews.text: Great chair! I'm 6'1' and about 200lb and I fit comfortably in this chair. Folds out relatively easy and feels pretty sturdy. Looking to get a 2nd one before our next camping trip..
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Soto

customer_reviews.title: This chair broke the second time I sat on it ...
customer_reviews.text: This chair broke the second time I sat on it. The screws and nuts came out the chair. I wish I could return it. I want to give it zero stars.
customer_reviews.author: Sherline

customer_reviews.title: Love this chair
customer_reviews.text: Love this chair. It is super comfortable, well built. Originally bought it for my dogs to use while caming but we ended up sharing. It's the end of camping season but my buy another one to have next year so dogs and I don't have to fight for it.
customer_reviews.author: amy

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these chairs. Used maybe a hand full of times to watch my daughter play ball and one is already broke. Not made well at all...especially for the money we paid for them!
customer_reviews.author: JenJen

customer_reviews.title: Nice chair more kids size or small adult
customer_reviews.text: Got the chair for me but sits too low... But the grandkids love it 💜
customer_reviews.author: Belinda Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable camping chair
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a replacement for a similar type chair to support my weight. Weight capacity of this chair is 260 lbs.Well constructed. Very comfortable for me (6' 1"; 250 lbs), have caught a few afternoon naps at the campsite in this chair.
customer_reviews.author: sure2rain

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought two for all the sports we attend. Couldn't be happier. No problems sitting through six hours of games a day. Very comfortable and easy to fold up. Heavy duty storage bag with the strap makes it easy to pack up and go.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Would order more!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome chair. Great quality and great size think this will really last
customer_reviews.author: AH

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: the chair is very functional and I just love it, used it today as well has my friend, she loves it too.
customer_reviews.author: T.J. tucker

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: A little smaller than expected, it will fit a teenager but not for s large adult
customer_reviews.author: colleen buden

customer_reviews.title: Folds easily and is very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. It folds nicely and is easy to carry! Love this chair!
customer_reviews.author: Penny Clark

customer_reviews.title: Comfy chairs...for kids
customer_reviews.text: Perfect camping chairs for my kids, would be a bit small for adults.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Ben

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart after a couple of uses.
customer_reviews.text: After only a couple of uses, 2 sews have fallen out!
customer_reviews.author: Pati

customer_reviews.title: Good chair for doggos
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for our dog, he loves it because he doesn’t fall through.
customer_reviews.author: melee

customer_reviews.title: Love this chair!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful camp chair! It is so comfortable! I am 5’10 210lbs and this chair fits me perfect
customer_reviews.author: Brian lane

customer_reviews.title: Great chair!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great chair. We bought it for my 8 year old son, so he could curl up by the campfire and he loved it! The other adults in our group loved it too, which was a bit of a problem because no one would let my son sit in it so we had to set down some rules. Get your own people!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... a year now and have to say it's the best camping chair I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: I've had this chair for almost a year now and have to say it's the best camping chair I've ever owned. It's durable, comfortable, and is always the envy of my friends on camping trips. I've even used it as extra indoor seating during larger get togethers and it's so comfortable it tends to be more desired than a spot on the couch.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than I thought
customer_reviews.text: Not worth what I paid for especially getting a deal on Amazon DOD. I expected them to be much larger. They will serve the purpose
customer_reviews.author: nicole bochin

customer_reviews.title: Seriously Comfy Camping Chair
customer_reviews.text: Very very comfortable camping chair. Great for folks of all body sizes. Portable. Kind of heavy but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: CA Girl in Portland

customer_reviews.title: Chair is awesome! I thought it would be more padded and ...
customer_reviews.text: Chair is awesome! I thought it would be more padded and the cup holder does not stand up well. But it is a very nice large folding chair.
customer_reviews.author: Belinda Biggers

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent chair. Very comfy for someone on the larger side. Wish I’d bought it sooner
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome Chairs
customer_reviews.text: We bought these chairs for camping and they fold down to a good size for storage and they are extremely comfortable. Worth the price...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Grandkids Love Them!
customer_reviews.text: Love these chairs for my grandkids, a little tuff for parents to use but really like them!
customer_reviews.author: DS

customer_reviews.title: Perfect camp chair
customer_reviews.text: Had these for a few years now and they are comfortable rugged and great
customer_reviews.author: John Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Nice
customer_reviews.text: 19 year old Grandson uses this for his gaming chair. So it is used allot! Very sturdy chair and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: GwammaB

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Sits a little low for me with back trouble, but that’s just me. Made very well and great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable and lower to the ground than other chairs so good to sit by a campfire. Easy foldup and storage. Nice looking and fun colors
customer_reviews.author: Laurie M.

customer_reviews.title: Good chair
customer_reviews.text: I use this in my living room to play video games. Its comfortable and sturdy. This chair is practically used every day
customer_reviews.author: Bree

customer_reviews.title: She loved it. Well constructed and easy to carry
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for a friend. She loved it. Well constructed and easy to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene J.

customer_reviews.title: A little small
customer_reviews.text: A little smaller than the other leisure chairs we got from Campland, but they are OK to keep. We are going to have to find some oversized ones though.
customer_reviews.author: Ghia Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and easy to get in/out
customer_reviews.text: Just got our chair. LOVE IT! High quality fabric, very easy to get in and out of, very sturdy. So sturdy my 2 year old crawled over it and it didn't tip at all.
customer_reviews.author: Miller242

customer_reviews.title: Good chair
customer_reviews.text: Only complaint is the bar across the front, some people don't like it.
customer_reviews.author: Len H

customer_reviews.title: Chair
customer_reviews.text: Daughter in law really loves it she can tuck right in.
customer_reviews.author: harlan cross

customer_reviews.title: This comfortable product is not only comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This comfortable product is not only comfortable, but it's convenient as well since it is easily folded and stored. I use it to relax on my deck at home all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Better Me

product_meta.title: KingCamp Camping Chair Moon Round Saucer Chair Folding Padded Portable Outdoor Chair for Adults with Cup Holder, Storage Bag, Carry Bag, Perfect for Camping Outdoor
feature_bullets: COMFORTABLE: 33.5 inches wide, enough for a big guy, moon saucer design folding chair curved ergonomic design, completely padded for all-around body comfort

CONVENIENT: The round folding chair has a large bag pocket on the back that allows you to store magazines, accessories, and personal items. Built-in cup holder, relax with a drink. Carry bag with carry strap for convenient transport and storage
DURABLE: Durable heavy-duty steel frame chair, more stable construction, moisture-wicking 600D Oxford Fabric, and strong plastic parts improves the overall weight capacity of 264 lbs
PORTABLE: The comfy outdoor chair, packed size 35 x 9.1 x 7.9 inches, space-saving. It only weighs 10.2 lbs. Included carry bag with shoulder strap for easy transport and storage
MULTI-USE: KingCamp folding camping chair is good for the camping, fishing, sporting events, outdoor and indoor activities. A good companion makes your travel more relaxed outdoors. 1-year warranty
